mdRecord.dcterms:title: Prime Minister Jawaharlal Nehru of the Dominion of India and Party at Washington's Tomb, October 12, 1949
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rowe, Abbie, 1905-1967
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print of Prime Minister Jawaharlal Nehru of the Dominion of India exiting Washington's tomb. Nearby are members of his party including his wife Kamala Nehru (white sari), Congresswoman and Vice Regent for Ohio Frances Payne Bolton, and Nehru's daughter Indira Nehru standing next to her father.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Washington, George, 1732-1799 -- Tomb
Mount Vernon Ladies' Association
